This is a basic email to test if the redirect of * works for improvmx.newsblur.com. In short, if you received this email at the right mailbox, you are all set!

Happy with ImprovMX? <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><head>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"/>
    <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8"/>
    <title></title>
    <style type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" media="all">
    /* Base ------------------------------ */
    body {
      width: 100% !important;
      height: 100%;
      margin: 0;
      -webkit-text-size-adjust: none;
    }

    u + #body a {
      color: inherit;
      text-decoration: none;
      font-size: inherit;
      font-family: inherit;
      font-weight: inherit;
      line-height: inherit;
    }
    
    a {
      color: #2fbeff;
      text-decoration:none;
    }

    a.unsub {
      color:#a9b1b9;
      border-bottom:1px dotted #a9b1b9;
    }
    
    a img {
      border: none;
    }
    
    td {
      word-break: break-word;
    }
    
    .preheader {
      display: none !important;
      visibility: hidden;
      mso-hide: all;
      font-size: 1px;
      line-height: 1px;
      max-height: 0;
      max-width: 0;
      opacity: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
    /* Type ------------------------------ */
    
    body,
    td,
    th {
      font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
      font-weight:400;
    }
    
    h1 {
      margin-top: 0;
      color: #212529;
      font-size: 30px;
      font-weight: 500;
      text-align: center;
    }
    
    h2 {
      margin-top: 0;
      color: #333333;
      font-size: 18px;
      font-weight: 500;
    }
    
    h3 {
      margin-top: 0;
      color: #868e96;
      font-size: 16px;
      font-weight: 500;
    }
    
    td,
    th {
      font-size: 16px;
    }
    
    p,
    ul,
    ol,
    blockquote {
      margin: .4em 0 1.8em;
      font-size: 16px;
      line-height: 1.625;
    }
    
    p.sub {
      font-size: 13px;
    }
</style></head><body>...</body></html>
